column1: If possible take a strong action against Terrorism. Because after few months Corona Virus will go but this Terrorism is a year decade long disease which needs to be cured too. Join hands with INDIA in demolising the one because its a threat for AMERICA 2 INDIA. #VisionOfNewWorld
